title: Prize-Worthy: An Ethereum Python Hackathon Guide
description: An interactive and beginner-friendly Ethereum Python Speedrun, hosted by the EF Python team. Quickly get up to speed with fundamental building blocks, then stack them into live applications. The workshop will cover some blockchain basics, then ease into intermediate topics and dapp architectures. By the end of this workshop, you'll have a clear idea of how to get your own projects off the ground.
